rdgGrp.n: ['', '<del>but i would not disturb their</del>', '', '<del> <unclear extent="2" unit="chars"/>he</del>']
['while neither the feeling of remorse of self accusation mingled with my throes; although the contempt with i was treated also prevented any sublime defiance to have a place in my mind.']

['they returned sooner than i expected and their inopportune appearance destroyed the fruits of so many months patience and expectation. my presence of mind deserted me at this crisis, i thought that', 'i']
